item.description:
Here's the location info from website and general Pecha Kucha info if you've not been to one before:


Announcing the 24th Pecha Kucha night in Providence! This month we will be celebrating our 2 year anniversary/birthday in Providence! There will be many special presenters, guests, and surprises all around! The party will be held at the newly open Roots Cafe http://www.rootscafep... (formerly the Black Rep) and is co-hosted and co-organized by our friends at Providence Monthly Magazine (http://www.providence.... .

If you haven't yet heard of this global yet unpronounceable phenomenon, Pecha Kucha is a monthly format for sharing ideas, in which presenters are allotted 20 slides and 20 seconds per slide. Put simply: 6 minutes and 40 seconds of adult-style ...show & tell. It began in Tokyo in 2003, has since spread to over 300 cities worldwide, and first landed in Providence in March of 09.

***Doors open at 7:20, presentations start at 8:20, and shmoozing goes down throughout.***
item.how_to_find_us: Suzanne is hosting this one, please look at her picture!
item.why: Its fun and if you've never been here's you're chance!
item.name: Pecha Kucha Tonight!
